website_summaries.verdict: It brews 60 cups of coffee in just 45 minutes, then keeps the temperature consistent throughout your whole event.
pros: The integrated spigot has a higher clearance than most urns so it can accommodate large coffee mugs
The spigot has two different options for dispensing and doesn’t drip once  you’ve finished filling your coffee cup
cons: This heats the water much hotter than you’d expect
Make sure  you put a sign on it to warn people

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is very nice. I was a bit reluctant to order it as it was a bit pricier than some but now that we have had it at church for awhile and use it every Sunday I am really glad I ordered it. It is very classy looking and works very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris. Button

customer_reviews.title: Great for events, really gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: Works well...almost too well, I would say it gets hotter than a certain hot coffee lawsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our church to replace cheaper ones that were unreliable. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: steve davies

customer_reviews.title: We purchase the coffeemaker for the church. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchase the coffeemaker for the church. It was a hit. Not only did the kitchen staff not have to make repeated pots because of it's 100 cup capacity but they claimed that it kept the coffee McDonalds hot.
customer_reviews.author: lois gilbert

customer_reviews.title: It's still a percolator
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something that brews a lot of coffee and doesn't look like a percolator, this is a great solution. It is kind of tedious but it gets the job done and looks pretty cool. It still does get grounds in the coffee and isn't a world-class piece of equipment, but the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these coffee pots!
customer_reviews.text: I am an office manager and a large high school. I have purchased several sets of coffee pots over the years and these are the best by far. I have used them about 10 times so far. They are so well made and look very attractive. The coffee perks quicker and stays at a good temperature for it to keep for several hours. The coffee is delicous. I have had many compliments from our coffee drinkers. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Auntiemj

customer_reviews.title: A great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: A great coffee maker. Just the right size and brews coffee quicker than any pot I have ever owned! The only problem is that about five cups is still in the pot when "empty". This may be a good idea, though. The pot never fully empties, so there is less chance of burning out the element.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Kael

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use at an adult day care so up to 40cups a day. Very nice design. Very easy to use. It’s been over a month and it is holding up for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pot
customer_reviews.text: This pot was everything that we needed in a coffee pot. Faster then I thought it would be for a 100 cup. Perfect temp and doesn't taste burnt after hours or being on. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-o

customer_reviews.title: As described heats quick and heats high
customer_reviews.text: If you are in need of a nice percolator i.e not for the back kitchen but can be displayed on a buffet this one is for you with a built in drip tray
customer_reviews.author: Velvel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fast, and hot.
customer_reviews.text: Ours consistently brought 6 gallons of water up to ~85-90oC in about 30 minutes. The spout mechanism worked well -- smooth and did not see any dripping. Seemed sturdy enough to feel comfortable transporting (in its shipping box).
customer_reviews.author: Elenabel

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I would give this coffee maker 5 stars instead of 4 because the power cord is not detachable for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for Church, Catering events.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is gorgeous. I bought to replace our very old, unsafe urn at church. It gets a ton of use and still looks new over a year later. It makes the full capacity in a short time, but also can make a good cup of coffee in smaller amounts. It cleans up well, and I am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Army Mom x 2

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: bouught for use at church for special occasions. Has been a life saver. easy to clean. Some people want me to use it every Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffeemaker makes water very hot!
customer_reviews.text: The first one came damaged because of poor packaging. The second one came with damaged box, but the product did not get damaged. I like the capacity of the coffeemaker, but it is very hot. I wish there were a control on it to change the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: a must
customer_reviews.text: we drink alot of tea. instead of having to boil water we have this on our counter. Also great because its so big and contains so much water we need to fill it up once a week. and if we have guest we dont need to refill multiple times like the smaller one. Had a hamilton beach before and after 7 months the unit was leaking all over the place. Had this one for about 5 months and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin APS

customer_reviews.title: A filter is necessary!
customer_reviews.text: We’re pleased with how quickly it brews, the taste is good, and the quality of the pot. But we found that a filter is absolutely necessary to prevent the grounds from plugging up the basket forcing the grounds to run over the basket and plugging up the spout leaving grounds in the cup. Not sure why there’s two spigots either which makes pouring slower and plugs easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Wyum

customer_reviews.title: It’s a high quality coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Our church ordered the 60 cup coffee maker. It’s durable, and works great. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: faith wittwer

product_meta.title: Focus Foodservice Coffeemaker, 60 Cup, Stainless Steel/Black
product_meta.description: Take the next step in your journey for the perfect cup of Coffee with this regalware 60 Cup commercial coffee maker coffee maker by Focus Foodservice LLC. The regalware 60 Cup commercial coffee maker knows how to make the most of your favorite ground Coffee, including the ability to wake up to a hot pot of Coffee that's easy to pour. If you're dedicated to great tasting coffee, Focus Foodservice LLC has the perfect Coffee maker for you.
feature_bullets: 60-Cup commercial stainless steel Coffee maker features an integrated spigot with a higher clearance; accommodates larger mugs and coffee-cups
Stainless steel body for greater durability and strength; measures 13. 3-Inch diameter by 20-inch high
Dual option non-drip spigot with locking feature; one-hand dispensing option
Dual thermostats for quicker heat-up and consistent serving temperature; fast brew times-60 cups in less than 45 minutes
Cup capacity based on 5-ounce cup(148ml); 6-feet cord with 3 prong grounded plug; 110-120V; 1500-watt

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
